items.title: Tutorial 1 - How to Start a Livestream (using the app - Recommended*)
items.description:
A step-by-step app on how to start the livestream using the app. 
*VERY IMPORTANT: Please repeat this process on each computer if you do have a multi-court tournament*

items.title: Tutorial 1A - How to Start a Livestream (manually)
items.description:
A step-by-step video to start a livestream with OBS, while using the YouTube website. 
*Try this if the app is bugging.*

items.title: Tutorial 2 - How to use the tournament rotator (on the app) - for game name auto-labeling
items.description: This will show you how to start and use the tournament rotator (on the app) so the game name will change automatically. (ex: 8:00 pm Carlton vs St. Mary; 4:00 pm Weyburn vs Moose Jaw)

items.title: Troubleshooting - How to reset video camera (regular, not GoPro)
items.description: This will show you how to reset the video camera using OBS, in case the image freezes.
